Honesto dreams that his children will finish their studies and hopes that his businesses will continue. He meets with his co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of his work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is comprised of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To buy medicines, groceries, and other products, to stock both his pharmacy and his variety store

loans.name: Ashurbiby

texts.ru: Ашурбиби добросовестная и целеустремленная женщина. Она кредитуется в первый раз. Ашурбиби имеет хорошую репутацию среди местного населения. Она имеет благополучную семью. Она замужем и имеет двоих сыновей. Его сыновьям 26 и 28 лет. Ашурбиби имеет 2 внуков. Ашурбиби более 20 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры. В основном она выращивает ячмень. Она имеет дополнительный доход от скотоводства. Ее муж помогает ей введение бизнеса. Ее сыновья каждый год ездят в Российскую Федерацию на заработки. Ашурбиби и ее семья год назд начали ремонт дома, так как их дом был маленьким в плохом состоянии. Она хочет этим летом продолжить ремонт дома и поэтому она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Ashurbiby is a conscientious and purposeful woman. She is taking a loan for the first time. Ashurbiby has a great reputation among the local people. She has a thriving family. She is married and has two sons. The sons are 26 and 28 years old. Ashurbiby has two grandchildren. 

Ashurbiby has worked with growing agricultural crops for more than 20 years. She mainly grows barley. She has an additional income from livestock breeding. Her husband helps her with managing the business. Every year her sons travel to the Russian Federation as migrant workers. 

A year ago, Ashurbiby and her family started restoring their home, as it was small and in bad condition. She would like to continue the restoration this summer, and therefore she requests a loan in the amount of 3,000 US dollars for the purchase of building materials. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as wood, cement for repairing house

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Rosa, tiene 27 años de edad, estudia la cerrera de licenciatura en Psicología, actualmente trabaja de niñera para poder pagar sus estudios, lo cual le interesa mucho para poder salir adelante en la vida encontrando otro empleo. El crédito que solicita es para pagar el curso de titulación para finalizar su carrera y así podrá cumplir parte de su sueño el apoyar a la educación de los niños en su pueblo y a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 27 years old and studying for a degree in psychology.  She is currently working as a nanny to make the money she needs to pay for her studies.  She is keen to make progress in life and find another job.  

Rosa will use the loan she is requesting to pay the fees necessary to officially register her degree so that she can complete her course.  This will enable her to realize her dream, to support the education of the children in her village and to support her family.

loans.use: to pay the necessary fees to officially register her degree

loans.name: Uber

texts.es: Uber, de 38 años de edad,vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Charo y su hijo de 16 años de edad respectivamente.Uber, se dedica a la siembra de cacao y café orgánico, los cuales después de cosecharlos, vende en el mercado de la ciudad más cerncana, en donde ya tiene varios clientes, que sabiendo de la calidad de sus productos no dudan en comprarlo todo al por mayor.Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que es un privilegio mantener sus tierras en buen estado. En adelante, espera seguir vendiendo sus productos, pero para mejorar sus ganancias desea comprarse un auto, con el cual pueda transportar sus cultivos.Este es el segundo préstamo con KIVA y sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, si desea acceder a otro crédito en el futuro.Uber, invertirá los S/.1500 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Uber is 38 years old and owns a house where he lives together with his wife Charo and their sixteen-year-old son. Uber works with the cultivation of organic coffee and cocoa, and after harvesting the crops he sells them at the market of the nearest town, where he already has several clients who know about the quality of his products and do not hesitate to buy everything in bulk. 

What Uber likes most about his work is to sow his land and make it fertile and productive. He has been doing this for 15 years and considers it a privilege to keep his land in good order. He hopes to continue selling his products in the future, however in order to improve his profits he would like to buy a car in which he can transport his crops. 

This is his second loan with Kiva and he knows that he has to make his repayments in time if he wishes to access another loan in the future. Uber will use the 1500 PEN to buy organic fertilizer to nourish his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Ibodat

texts.ru: Ибодату 46 лет. Она замужем и имеет 2 совершеннолетних детей. Ибодат как трудолюбивый и честный человек, всю свою жизнь проработала на поле и занималась выращиванием сельхоз культуры как зерновые культуры и овощи. Ее муж Турсунмурод помогает ей введение бизнеса. Она работает с удовольствием на поле и с честным трудом зарабатывает деньги. Ее сыновья занимаются предоставлением услуги строителя. Они работают в строительной бригаде и имеют сезонную работу. Ее старший сын хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию, так как сейчас сезон для постройки объектов в России. Она запрашивает займ для покупки авиабилета для сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Ibodat is 46 years old. She is married and has two adult children. Being a hardworking and honest woman, Ibodat has worked in the field her whole life, growing agricultural crops such as cereals and vegetables. Her husband, Tursunmurod, helps her in managing the business. She gladly works in the field and earns money with honest labor. 

Ibodat's sons provide a building service. They work in a construction crew and have seasonal work. Her oldest son would like to go to the Russian Federation, as it is currently the season for construction in Russia. She requests a loan for the purchase of plane tickets for her son. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase a plane ticket for her son, who wants to go to Russia to work

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Y's Group

texts.en:
Y is 47 years old. She has three children, who are carpenters. Her children have gotten married. Her husband is a builder to earn a living. His income is about 5,000,000 VND per month. Y is a farmer, a builder's helper and a carpenter. She has done this work for 21 years. She earns about 4,000,000 VND per month. Her family’s total income is about 9,000,000 VND per month. 

Y's challenge in work is a lack capital to buy a wood cutting machine, and to buy more wood. She wants to open her own woodworking shop. Her dream is to enlarge her carpentry business with all the machines to do the work most efficiently, and her children would work at the family's own carpentry workshop, established by their mother. This loan is one step helping her to reach for her dream. Y is a hardworking woman.

She participated in SEDA’s credit program since 2012. In the last loan cycle, she borrowed 5,152,000 VND to perform carpentry work, and she repaid on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 7,392,000 VND, which she will use to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. This purchase will enable her to gain earnings and save profit, to build a home.

Other members who are part of Y’s group include the following:
Truyen is 39 years old. She has two children. She is a laborer. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to breed pigs.
Nga is 30 years old. She has two children. She is a carpenter. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to make carpentry. 
Nga is 26 years old. She is a carpenter. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to make carpentry.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry workshop, and earn more profit with which to build a home.

loans.name: Stanley

texts.en: Stanley runs a quarry to earn his income. He is requesting a loan from SMEP DTM, which he will use to buy a water tank for personal use at his house. He faces a challenge of water supply. With the tank, Stanley will be able to store and harvest clean water.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank

loans.name: Ruzigul

texts.ru: Рузигул последние 12 лет занимается животноводством. Она многодетная мать. У нее четверо сыновей в возрасте 24, 16, 14, 3-х лет и одна дочь в возрасте 16 лет. Рузигул с мужем и детьми проживает в районе Вахш. У нее большая и дружная семья. Ее старшие сыновья занимаются сбором и продажей металлолома. Сама Рузигул вместе с мужем занимается куплей и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Они покупают коров и телят, откармливают их и по прошествии месяца продают на скотном рынке с наценкой. За счет дохода, получаемой с деятельности они покрывают семейные расходы. Сейчас Рузигул обратилась за кредитом для продолжения своей деятельности и надеется на поддержку.
texts.en:
Ruzigul has worked with livestock breeding for the last 12 years. She is the mother of many children. She has four sons of the ages of 24, 16, 14 and 3, and one daughter of the age of 16. Ruzigul, her husband and her children live in the Vakhsh region. She has a large and friendly family.

Ruzigul's eldest sons work with collecting and selling scrap metal. Ruzigul and her husband work with purchasing and reselling cattle. They purchase cows and calves, fatten them, and after a month sell them with a profit at the cattle market. With the income received from the business they cover the family expenses. Currently Ruzigul applied for a loan to continue with the business and hopes for support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for reselling

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  Benkadi est constitué de 4 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 32 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent  à moitié dans des  familles nucléaires  à Dialanikoro, un des quartiers de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Afin de  renforcer leurs capacités financières pour de mieux faire leurs commerces, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur cinquième  prêt et tous les quatre prêts précédents ont  été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de friperie,  de bois de chauffe, de poissons, d ’habits, etc.
DIKEL, première de la droite vers la gauche,  fait l’achat vente de poissons.  Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 500 kilos de poissons auprès des grossistes. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché, dans les foires des villages environnants  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Benkadi group is composed of four married women averaging 32 years of age, with three children. They live [mostly] in  nuclear families in Dialanikoro, a neighborhood of the town of Bougouni.

They know each other as neighbors and friends as well as through their work. In order to reinforce their capital and better manage their business, they have joined the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution and are now on their fifth loan, with the four prior loans duly repaid. The group members sell used clothing, firewood, fish, outfits etc. Dikel, the first one on the right, buys and resells fish. She plans to use her loan to buy 500 kg [about 1100 lbs] of fish from wholesalers. She sells at the marketplace, at the markets of nearby villages and out of her home, retail, for cash and on credit, to a customer base composed of both women and men.She plans to earn an average monthly revenue of 50,000 West African franks, which will be used to reinvest in her business and pay off the loan.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Bertilda Rosa

texts.es: Bertilda, 50 años de edad, casada, madre de 6 hijos,  es originaria de Tipitapa municipio de Managua, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de cosmético y ropa actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años . Sus comienzos fueron vendiendo de manera ambulante ropa interior en los mercados poco a poco fue creando su cartera de clientes ella vende de contado y de crédito. Actualmente tiene una mini tienda en su casa donde además de vender ropa también vende cosméticos. Ella está solicitando el financiamiento para comprar ropa interior, cosméticos, pantalones, camisas, brasieres, calzoncillos, camisetas etc.  Esto le permitirá comprar más ampliamente inventario de mercadería para vender y cumplir con los pedidos que tiene. Por lo pronto está buscando un local más céntrico donde establecer una tienda de mercadería variada.
texts.en:
Bertilda is 50 years old, married and the mother of 6 children.  She is from Tipitapa, Managua.

Bertilda is a saleswoman who sells cosmetics and clothing.  She has been in this business for three years.  She started out selling underwear as an itinerant street vendor in the markets and gradually built up her current customer portfolio.  She sells to her customers for cash and on credit.  Bertilda currently has a mini store in her home where she sells cosmetics as well as clothing.  She is requesting this loan to buy underwear, cosmetics, trousers, shirts, bras, underpants, t-shirts, etc.  This will give her more merchandise to sell and she will be able to fill the orders that she has.  She is currently looking to find more central business premises where she can set up a store selling a variety of merchandise.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, trousers, shirts, bras, t-shirts, underpants etc.

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es: El grupo “Sagrada Familia”  está conformada por 08 mujeres emprendedoras que cada día se esfuerzan por salir adelante. Victoria de 50 años de edad es casada con 04 hijos, 02  de ellos aún dependientes. Con los trabajos que realizó y el buen uso que le dio a sus ingresos puedo cumplir con uno de sueños el de contar con su propio negocio, actualmente cuenta con una  bodega en su vivienda desde hace más de 15 años. Se siente feliz pues gracias a su esfuerzo puede seguir apoyando a sus hijos con su educación. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de víveres como arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos y golosinas. El deseo de Victoria es de ver a sus hijos realizados profesionalmente, es por ello que se esfuerza. El grupo está agradecido con los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada.    Victoria se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste polo color fucsia y chaleco negro.
texts.en: The "Sacred Family" group consists of 8 entrepreneurial women who strive each day to move forward. Victoria is 50 and married with four children, two of whom she still supports. Through her hard work and wise use of income, Victoria was able to realize one of her dreams by opening her own business. She has run a small grocery store in her home for over 15 years. Victoria is happy because her labors allow her to continue supporting her children's education. Victoria will use this loan to purchase supplies such as rice, sugar, milk, noodles, and snacks. Victoria's hope and her motivation is to see her children become successful professionals. The group is grateful for Kiva lenders for the support they've provided. In the group photo, Victoria is seated at the left in the first row, wearing a pink shirt with a black vest.

loans.use: To purchase rice, sugar, milk, noodles, and snacks.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan is 38 years old. She has two children. One of them has gotten married, and the other is learning in university. Lan and her husband are carpenters. Her husband earns about 7,000,000VND per month. She earns about 5,000,000VND per month. She has done this job for 13 years. Besides that, she also is a farmer. Her family’s total income is about 12,000,000VND per month. Lan's challenge in her work is a lack of capital with which to open her own carpentry workshop. Her dream is making wooden beds and cabinets for export. She wants to work at home and must not go far.  This loan is one step helping her to reach for her dream. She is a hardworking and careful woman.
 
Lan has participated in SEDA’s credit program since 2010. In the last loan cycle, she borrowed 8,736,000VND to make carpentry, and she repaid on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 10,080,000VND to invest in her carpentry business. She always wants to expand her business and raise her children up well.

loans.use: to invest in her carpentry business.

loans.name: Normahmad

texts.ru: Нормахмад жизнерадостный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 35 лет. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. Живут они дружно и счастливо. Хотя условия для их жизни не совсем благоприятные, так как они живут в горной местности, но Нормахмад старается обеспечивать своих детей всем необходимым. Чтобы иметь постоянный доход в семье он занимается своим бизнесом.  Нормахмад разводит скот, откармливает их и продаёт. И от этого бизнеса он имеет постоянный хороший доход в семью. В наличии он имеет 6 голов мелко рогатого скота. В реализации данного бизнеса ему помогает жена Нилуфар. Она хорошая помощница своему мужу и заботливая мать для своих детей. Также Нормахмад занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры. В прошлом году он получил хороший урожай и приемлемую прибыль, как дополнительный доход. Но так как основной доход ему приносит животноводство, Нормахмад желает расширить этот бизнес и увеличить получаемый доход для удовлетворения нужд своей семьи. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит для  покупки несколько голов скота для дальнейшей их продажи. Он очень надеется на поддержку и заранее благодарит Арванд.
texts.en: Normahmad is a happy and responsible 35 year-old man.  He is married and has four children.  They live in harmony and happiness.  Their living conditions are not very favorable because they live in a mountainous area, but Normahmad tries to provide his children with all of the necessities.  He is involved in his own business in order to have a consistent income in the family.  He has six heads of small livestock.  His wife, Nilufar, helps him with this business.  She is a good helper to her husband and a caring mother to her children.  Also, Normahmad is involved in growing agricultural crops.  Last year, he got a harvest and a decent profit as an additional income.  But because animal husbandry yields his main income, Normahmad wants to expand this business and increase his income to satisfy his family's needs.  This is why he came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy several heads of livestock for subsequent resale.  He relies on the support very much and thanks Arvand in advance.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Felicisima

texts.en:
This is Felicisima. She previously accessed a PHP 30,000 loan that she used to buy additional stocks of dish-washing liquid and other products. Her earnings were a big help for paying for the education of her children and in the family's personal, household, and business expenditures. 

Felicisima would like to apply for another loan, in the amount of  PHP 15,000, to buy additional stocks of supplies needed in her business, like dish-washing liquid, perfume, and fabric softener. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain the family's daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Felicisima hopes to expand her business further. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stocks of supplies needed in her business, like dish-washing liquid, perfume, and fabric softener.

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: Фарход добросовестный человек. Ему 24 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Его жена домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием детей, так как их дети еще маленькие. Фарход более 2 лет занимается предоставлением услуги таксиста. Он работает упорно для того, чтобы зарабатывать деньги и обеспечить свою семью, так как он является единственным кормильцем в семье. Он предоставляет свои услуги на высшем уровне, так как конкуренция большая и очень трудно привлечь клиентов. Фарход очень общительный и жизнерадостный человек и поэтому ему легко удается получать успех. Фарход хочет провести мероприятие в семье, но он не имеет достаточно денег. С целью получения займа он обратился в ИМОН. Он запрашивает займ в сумме 3500 сомони. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Farhod is a conscientious man. He is 24 years old. He is married and raising two children. His wife is a housewife who raises the children, as they are still young. 

Farhod has worked as a taxi driver for more than two years. He works hard in order to earn money and support his family, as he is the only provider. He offers a high quality service, as there are many competitors and very hard to attract customers. Farhod is a very sociable and cheerful man, and therefore it is easy for him to be successful. 

Farhod would like to arrange an event for his family, but he does not have sufficient money. With an aim to receive a loan he turned to IMON. He requests a loan of the amount of 3,500 somoni. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To arrange an event for his family

loans.name: Um E Habiba's Group

texts.en:
Um e Habiba is a 33-year-old housewife. She lives with her husband and three children in Punjab, Pakistan. 

Since 2007, her husband has had a general store and he works very hard to meet his family needs. He needs additional capital for the growth of his business. For that, his wife, Um e Habiba, as a member of two-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. 

With the loan money, her husband will purchase salt, cooking oil, sugar, flour, rice, candies, bubbles, etc. for his general store, to satisfy his clients more professionally as well as to increase his savings, for the better future of his children.

Um e Habiba and her husband are very hopeful that the loan will be a lucky and productive one for their family. Um e Habiba is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy salt, cooking oil, sugar, flour, rice, candies, bubbles, etc. for her husband's store.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza es una mujer de 25 años de edad agricultora y ama de casa en particular, madre de 2 hijas a quienes ama mucho y apoya en todo lo necesario. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria completa cursada hasta el 6 grado y agradece el apoyo que sus padres le dieron al darle la oportunidad de estudiar. Fueron ellos los que le enseñaron a cultivar hortaliza entre otros como el maíz, frijol y café pero en especial la papa ya que en la zona donde ella habita el clima y la tierra es apta para el mismo siendo ella y su esposo los únicos que se involucran. Su producto es comercializado en el mercado local, con los intermediarios que llegan hasta la zona para poder comprar entre otros.

Ella actualmente solicita ayuda para la compra de semilla de papa certificada, abono y fertilizantes para poder cultivar y dar su asistencia técnica al producto.  

Sus sueños son los de poder producir en mayor escala, vender su producto en otros mercados y en otros países de centro américa para poder generar mayores ingresos para su familia y darle un mejor futuro a sus hijas.
texts.en:
25-year old Maritza is a farmer and a housekeeper in a private home. She is mother to two daughters whom she loves very much and supports in every way possible. She completed grade 6 of primary school and is grateful to her parents for the opportunity to attend school. They were the ones who taught her how to grow crops such as corn, beans, and coffee, and above all, potatoes. Potatoes are well-suited to the climate and land where she lives. Maritza and her husband are the only ones involved in this activity. The produce is sold in the local market to distributors who travel to the area to buy goods.

Maritza is now seeking financial assistance to buy certified seed potatoes, manure and fertilizer for her crops and get technical help for her land.

Her dreams are to grow crops on a bigger scale and sell the produce in other markets and Central American countries so she can generate more income for her family and provide her daughters with a better future.

loans.use: buy certified seed potatoes, manure and fertilizer for her crops

loans.name: Migdelia De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Migdelia, es una humilde ama de casa, de oficio comerciante, quien viven en la ciudad de Managua, madre de tres hijos  de 14, 11 y 8 años de edad todos están estudiando.  Ella inicio su negocio hace 5 años cuando decidió tener su negocio propio pues no había estudiado ninguna profesión y necesitan conseguir ingresos para su familia y poder darles estudios a sus hijos además que la pulpería es un negocio que le permite estar cerca de sus hijos. 
Ella está necesitando el financiamiento para comprar granos básicos, aceite, jugos, gaseosas, leche, avenas, papel higiénico, detergentes, jabones  etc. Todos son productos de mucha necesidad entre su clientela además que en su vecindario no hay muchas pulperías que tengan variedad de productos. Pues a ella le gustaría convertir su pulpería en una miscelánea  y poder tener ingresos que le permitan brindarle una carrera universitaria a sus tres hijos.
texts.en: Migdelia is a humble head of household and, by profession, a shopkeeper. She lives in the city of Managua, she is the mother of three children who are 14, 11 and 18 years old, who are all studying. She began her business 5 years ago when she decided to open her own store because she hadn't studied for any degree and needed to earn money for her family and to give her children an opportunity to go to school. Also, her store allows her to be near her children. She needs to finance the purchase of basic grains, oil, juices, sodas, milk, flour, hygienic paper, detergents, soaps etc. All these products are in high demand among her customers, also, in her neighborhood there aren't many grocery stores that have a variety of products. And so, she would like to make her grocery store into one that provides miscellaneous items and to be able to earn enough money that would allow her to pay for her children to attend college and study for a career.

loans.use: purchase basic grains, oil, juices, sodas, milk, flour, hygienic paper, detergents, soaps etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El cliente vive en Guayaquil. Empezó su negocio de venta de calzado hace ya 3 años atrás para poder soportar los gastos de su familia. Poco a poco fue mejorando sus ingresos hasta ahora que trabaja desde las 09:00am hasta las 22:00pm todos los dias. 

Su forma de trabaja es vender los zapatos a sus amigos, conocidos y referidos. Poco a poco a mejorado su calidad de vida. Aunque una de sus dificultades para trabajar es que es pvvs (persona viviendo con vih sida) y eso le dificulta para trabajar al 100%. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo zapatos y así tener mas diversidad con su mercadería y poder obtener mas ventas.
texts.en:
The client lives in Guayaquil.  He started his business selling shoes three years ago in order to cover family expenses.  He gradually improved his income and now he works from 9am until 10pm every day.

His way of working is selling shoes to his friends, acquaintances and referred customers.  His quality of life has gradually improved even though one of his difficulties to work is that he’s a PVVS (person living with HIV/AIDS) and that makes it hard for him to work at 100%.

He has many hopes for his business which is why he wants to use the loan to buy shoes to have more variety of merchandise and be able to increase his sales.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Lauren Teresa

texts.es:
Lauren, es una joven de 21 años de edad, soltera habitante de la ciudad de Managua, ella se dedica al comercio. Sus inicio fueron hace tres años cuando decidió poner una pulpería con el apoyo de su madre, con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha mantenido su negocio ya tiene una clientela fija que siempre están busca de productos para consumo familiar. 
Ella está requiriendo financiamiento para comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico ,pollo, cosmético etc. Esto le permitirá surtir su negocio de más productos y poder satisfacer la necesidad entre su clientela. Uno de sus proyectos que desea realizar es la venta de ropa pues adicional a su pulpería quiere poner una mini tienda de ropa con el objetivo de ir diversificando su  negocio además que desea lograr graduarse y ser una empresaria de éxito.
texts.en:
Lauren is a young woman of 21.  She is single, lives in the city of Managua and runs a convenience store that she decided to set up with her mother's support three years ago.  She has managed to keep her business running through a lot of hard work and dedication and now has regular customers who are always looking to buy basic household products from her. 

Lauren needs this loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, toilet paper, chicken, cosmetics, etc.  This will allow her to stock her business with more products and meet the needs of her customers.  Lauren would like to start selling clothing.  In addition to running her convenience store, she would like to set up a mini clothing store with the aim of diversifying her business.  She would also like to graduate and become a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, toilet paper, chicken, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Evelyn Jacqueline

texts.es: Evelyn , de 32 años de edad , casada madre de 2 hijos de 13 y 11 años de edad los cuales esta estudiando para salir adelante pues es la mejor herencia que le es puede dejar. Ella empezó a formar su pulpería a los 24 años de edad, pues miro la oportunidad en su vecindario de poner una pulpería pues no había muchas cercas y la necesidad era grande. Así que decidió invertir lo poco que tenía para empezar su propio negocio. Ya tiene 8 años con este negocio el cual han mantenido a su familia. Hoy esta solicitando el crédito para comprar vitrinas para exhibir sus productos y compra de granos básicos, aceite, productos de limpieza. Pues es importante ofrecer productos de necesidad entre su clientela además de tener los productos en buenas condiciones donde sus clientes puedan apreciar y escoger aunque hoy vende productos al por menor su idea a futuro es convertir su pulpería en una miscelánea.
texts.en:
Evelyn, 32, is married and mother of two children who are 13 and 11 years of age and attending school to get ahead since this is the best inheritance she can leave them.  She started to form her grocery store at the age of 24 because she noticed that opening a grocery store in her neighborhood was a good opportunity because there weren’t many nearby and need was great.

She decided, then, to invest what little she had to start her own business.  She’s now been in this business 8 years and she’s supported her family by means of it.  Today, she’s asking for a loan to buy display cases to exhibit her goods and to buy basic grains, oil and cleaning supplies because it’s important to offer products her customers need and also to have products that are in good condition so her customers can evaluate them and choose.  Although at present she sells at retail her idea for the future is to convert her grocery store into a general store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc sheets, blocks, sand, cement, and iron.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria , de 42 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Managua, casada, madre de 4 hijos , se dedica a la venta de cosméticos . Anteriormente se dedicaba a elaborar dulces de coco , actividad que le permitió tener bastante clientela después asistió a una capacitación para vender cosméticos por catálogos y le gusto. Ahí fue donde decidió dedicarse por completo a  la venta de cosméticos de varias marcas, ella vende al contado y al crédito a personas que trabajan en empresas privadas y amas de casa. Su esposo la apoya con lo que gana como mecánico.
Ella está requiriendo el crédito para comprar perfumes, cremas, pinturas de uña, labiales, bases etc. Esto le permitirá tener más surtido de nuevos productos su negocio de igual manera ofrecer variedad. Uno de sus planes futuros que desea realizar es poner una pulpería.
texts.en:
42-year-old Maria lives in the city of Managua.  She is married and the mother of four children.  Her business is selling cosmetics.  In the past, Maria used to sell coconut candies which allowed her to build up a decent customer base.  She then attended a training session on selling cosmetics through catalogs and enjoyed it.  As a result, she decided to start working full time selling different brands of cosmetics.  She sells her products for cash and on credit to people who work in private companies and housewives.  Her husband supports her with what he earns as a mechanic.

Maria needs this loan to buy perfume, creams, nail polish, lipsticks, foundation, etc.  This will allow her to have more new products available in her business so that she can sell a wider range of goods.  One of her future plans is to set up a convenience store.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, nail polish, lipsticks, foundation, etc.

loans.name: Tamer

texts.en:
Tamer is a 29-year-old, single man. He is the oldest brother of four siblings. 

Tamer works in a private company during the day and after that, he goes to open his general store, where he mostly sells small tools and equipment. 

Now, Tamer is applying for a youth loan to bring some hammers, axes, and other repair tools to his store.

loans.use: to bring some hammers, axes, and other repair tools to his store.

loans.name: Aliaa

texts.en:
Aliaa is a 40-year-old, married woman. She has a family of seven members, supported by her husband, who works in scrap sales. Aliaa, on the other hand, opened her house as a day care, looking after the children of working mothers. 

She is applying for a loan to buy a small bus, to provide bus transportation services, in addition to the day care services.

loans.use: to buy a small bus, to provide transportation services for her day care.

loans.name: Mwanamgeni

texts.en:
Mwanamgeni is married and has four children who attend school. For the past 10 years, she has operated a retail shop business, selling household consumables to local customers. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

Mwanamgeni is requesting a loan from Yehu for 20,000 KES, which she wlll use to purchase wheat flour, beans, maize flour, and soft drinks to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business. She owns a house that has no electricity or piped water.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, beans, maize flour, and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Lesly

texts.es: Lesly, de 21 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de sus padres y de su hija Emily en la casa donde nació y se crío.Lesly se dedica a la agricultura y cuando conformó su familia junto a su pequeña hija, comprendió que debía trabajar el doble, pues es madre soltera. Comenta que su principal ingreso es la venta de alfalfa, pues tiene terrenos agrícolas en donde siembra los pastos naturales, los mismos que le otorgan diariamente ingresos económicos que le permiten criar a su pequeña hija, “la alfalfa me ayuda también a alimentar a mis animales poseo ovejas de calidad, las cuales comercializa cuando se encuentran maduras”, afirma. Es así que ahora espera poder mejorar sus ingresos y aumentar su ganado.Este es el primer préstamo con KIVA y agradece el apoyo de todos ustedes pues emprenderá su negocio con el apoyo financiero necesario para seguir adelante , además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Lesly, invertirá los S/.1000 soles en comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
Lesly, 21, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with her parents and her daughter, Emily, in the same house where she was born and raised.  Lesly works in agriculture and when she formed her family with her little girl she realized that she’d have to work twice as hard because she’s a single mother.  

She comments that her main source of income is alfalfa sales because she has large tracts of farmland where she grows natural grasses which produce daily income that makes it possible for her to support her daughter.  “Alfalfa also helps me feed my animals; I own quality sheep that I sell when they are mature,” she affirms.  

She hopes now to be able to improve her income and increase her herd size.  This is her first Kiva loan and she’s grateful to all of you for your support because she’ll carry out her business with the financial support necessary to get ahead.  In addition, she promises to be punctual with her installment payments.  Lesly will use the 1,000 soles to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Osmar Javier

texts.es:
Osmar, tiene 25 años de edad, actualmente vive con sus padres y su compañera de vida que tiene 20 años de edad. El, se dedica  a la siembra y producción de hortalizas tales como: pepino, ejotes, tomates, chiles, el oficio lo realiza desde hace cinco años y actividad que la aprendió con su padre.
El préstamo que requiere lo invertirá en compra de semilla de chiles, tomates, pepino, ejotes y los insumos necesarios para llevarlo a cabo: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, entre otros; este le permitirá  incrementar el área de cultivo para obtener mayores ingresos.
Su sueño es tener su propio terreno para realiza el cultivo y su propia casa.
texts.en:
Osmar, 25, currently lives with his parents and his 20-year-old life companion.  He works growing and producing vegetables like cucumber, tomatoes, chilies and green beans.  He’s been in this line of work for five years having learned it from his father.

The loan he needs will be used to buy chili, tomato and green bean seeds and the necessary supplies to carry it out like manure, herbicide and pesticide, among others.  This will make it possible for him to increase his cultivated area to earn higher income.  His dream is to own his own field to farm on and to own a house.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy organic manure

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio, de 46 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de su esposa Gabina y sus 2 hijos , con quienes cuida en la casa que compró hace 7 años.Desde joven aprendió el oficio de la carpintería pues su padre le heredó todo sus conocimientos. Cuenta con un pequeño taller en su casa, donde realiza todos los días sus trabajos. Gracias a su lucha constante logró comprar una casa céntrica, la cual alquila y le produce también ingresos extras para mantener los estudios de sus jóvenes hijos.Este es el primer crédito con KIVA, afirma sentirse agradecido con el apoyo financiero que recibe, pues comenzará a mejorar sus ingresos y a crecer con su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Julio, invertirá los S/.2000 soles en la compra de madera al por mayor.
texts.en: Julio is 46 years old and a responsible man. He lives with his wife Gabina and his two children, who he raises in his home he bought 7 years ago. Since he was young, he began learning carpentry from his father, who passed down all of his knowledge. He has his own small workshop in his house where he works every day on one of hi projects. Thanks to his constant determination, he has been able to purchase another home that he rents out and through which he is able to earn additional income that he uses to pay for his children's schooling. This is his first credit with Kiva and he says that he is grateful for the financial help that he will receive because it will help him to begin to improve his earnings and to grow his business. And so, he promises to be punctual in his repayments. Julio will invest the money in purchasing wholesale wood.

loans.use: purchase wholesale wood.

loans.name: Shahinaz

texts.en:
Shahinaz is a 37-year-old, married woman. She is a mother of four children. 

Her husband is a driver, while she works at home doing many things. She makes embroidered dresses or fabric pieces, makes pickles, and sells blankets and bed covers. 

Now, Shahinaz is applying for a loan to buy more summer bed covers, to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy more summer bed covers to sell.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a 24-year-old, single lady who looks after the house with the help of her five siblings, after their mother passed away. She is a university student, majoring in the English language at a private university. 

Now, Asmaa is applying for an educational loan to pay for her next semester's fees.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester's fees.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en: Teresa is 43 years old and married with four grownup children. She is engaged in selling foods in front of their house. She wakes up early to buy what she needs in her business. She is a very patient person. She does everything that she needs to do just to provide for the needs of her family. Teresa wishes someday to build her own stall in front of their house to display her foods, and for the comfort of her clients.

loans.use: to buy barbecue sticks, meat, and spices for her business

loans.name: Roxana Victoria

texts.es: Roxana de 32 años de edad se dedica a la venta de sandalias desde hace varios años vende de forma ambulante en las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela pues sus productos son de buena calidad y a precios realmente accesibles con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, Roxana esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería por mayor y poder surtir aun mas su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
32-year old Roxana has earned her living selling sandals for several years in the streets of nearby neighborhoods. She has many customers as her products are of good quality and very fair prices. With the money she earns from sales, she pays for some of the household expenses. She lives in her own house with her husband and three children. 

Roxana is seeking a loan to buy more merchandise at wholesale prices and add to her stock. In this way she will earn more money and be able to provide her family with greater financial stability

loans.use: Buy more sandals at wholesale prices

loans.name: German Agustín

texts.es:
German tiene 36 años de edad, esta casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Su hermano le enseño la herrería y desde entonces han trascurrido 10 años. Para trasladar los materiales debe de pagar transporte particular porque es muy pesado para llevarlo cargando hasta su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar hierro en mayor cantidad y fabricar los machetes, cumas, etc que son herramientas que se utilizan en el campo. Con el dinero que tiene disponible solo le alcanza para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia y no para invertir en comprar más hierro; por esa razón solicita el crédito. Al vender más su producto sus ingresos mejoraran para volver a invertir en su negocio y enviara sus hijos a la escuela
texts.en: German is 36, married, and has four children. His brother taught him blacksmithing, which has been his trade for 10 years. He has to pay a trucker to deliver the materials to his house because they are very heavy. He has applied to Fundación Campo for a loan to buy wholesale iron to make machetes, cleavers, and other field tools. He has applied for a loan because he is only able to pay for his family's basic needs with his own funds and cannot invest to buy more iron. When he sells his merchandise, his income will increase and he can reinvest in his business and send his children to school.

loans.use: to buy wholesale iron to make machetes, cleavers, and other field tools.

loans.name: Noufa

texts.en: Noufa is a 42-year-old illiterate woman who works in a vegetable and fruit nursery to help her husband who has retired from the armed forces in supporting their six children. She also sells clothes in a small shop that she opened close to her house to make additional income. Now Noufa is applying for a loan to bring in more female clothing items to sell.

loans.use: to bring in more female clothing items to sell

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
This is Clarita, 63, resident of Payatas, Philippines. She is a widow and has children. At her age, she continues to work to provide for her everyday needs.

Clarita operates a piggery. She earns money by selling live hogs to meat dealers. Sometimes they have the pigs slaughtered and sold in the market.  Aside from this she also cooks breakfast meals for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 1200 in sales every week.

To help her continue the operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 27,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy feed and additional hogs. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Clarita hopes that her business will continue to be successful and dreams of having good health. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and she also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for feed and additional hogs needed for her business

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen and her husband have 3 sons and 2 daughters. She has to take care of the children as well as look after all family affairs. Her husband was working in a garment factory. He decided to stop working because the office working hours from 8:00 am to 10:00 pm were not convenient for maintaining a family life. Then he started to drive a rented rickshaw.

He could not save enough money to cover the daily expense of paying the rent of the rickshaw, so he desires to buy a rickshaw. For this Nasreen has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband.

She hopes that her husband's income will be double after getting the loan. Nasreen desires to send their children to school. She is also planning to do something to support her husband financially. She is very serious and a good planner with new ideas. They will be successful, it is just a matter of time. They are spiritually developed. Nasreen is leading a happy life with a sound health.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw.

loans.name: Elham

texts.en: Elham is a 20 year old single lady. She has 6 older siblings who help her in her studies, but for now Elham wants to make it easier on them by applying for an educational loan to pay for her next semester's fees. She is majoring in managerial information systems.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester's fees.

loans.name: Maleyka

texts.ru:
Малейка 48 лет, она замужем и у нее сын. Она работает учительницей в школе, ее муж мастер и его ежемесячный доход около 400 АЗН в месяц. Кроме этого для дополнительного заработка они занимаются сельско-хозяйственним бизнесом. Она продает молочние продукты и мясо. Они планируют отремонтировать стойло животных, построить новый забор вокруг дома, сделать ремонт дома и справить свадьбу для сына. 
Цель обращения за кредитом на сегодня является постройка нового забора. Для этого Малейке требуется 700 АЗН.
texts.en: Maleyka is 48 years old, married and has one son.  She works as a teacher at a school where her husband is master and his monthly income is about 400 AZN.  In addition, they run their own agriculture business.  Maleyka sells diary products and meat.  They plan to renovate the animals' stalls, build a new fence around and make repairs to their home, and pay for their son's wedding.  The purpose of this loan is to help build the new fence.  For this, Maleyka needs 700 AZN.

loans.use: To build a new fence around her house.

loans.name: Helena Emperatriz

texts.es:
Helena, requiere de un nuevo prestamo porque necesita mas capital de trabajo para seguir invirtiendo en el negocio; este le permitirá comprar productos de belleza tales como: lociones, cremas, desodorantes, golosinas, artículos de enchapes y asimismo adquirir ropa; este le ayudara a invertir más en el negocio, incrementar el inventario y generar más utilidades para apoyar a su familia.
EL credito anterior le ayudo a mejorar los ingresos; las condiciones economicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Helena needs a new loan because she needs more working capital in order to continue investing in her business.  This will allow her to buy beauty products such as:  lotions, creams, deodorants, snacks, gold-plated jewelry items and also purchase clothing.  This will help her to invest more in her business, increase her inventory and generate more profits to support her family.

The previous loan helped her to improve her earnings.  Her economic conditions and family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, deodorants, snacks, gold-plated jewelry items, as well as clothing.

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es: Eduarda, de 64 años de edad vive con uno de sus 4 hijos en la casa de material rústico que compró hace 30 años.Eduarda se dedica a la agricultura desde su niñez, en la actualidad recibe la ayuda de sus hijos que ya son personas mayores y que vienen en cada temporada de siembra y cosecha a apoyar a su padre; de esta manera ha mejorado su situación económica y esto le permite seguir adelante ya que en muchas ocasiones este trabajo suele ser díficil y requiere de maquinarias para optimizar su trabajo,  sus cosechas son vendidas al por mayor en el mercado central de la ciudad más cercana a su localidad y en estos últimos años ha recuperado lo invertido, su deseo para más adelante es incursionar de manera formal en el comercio de sus cultivos.Este es el primer préstamo con KIVA y agradece el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Eduarda, invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Eduarda is 64 and lives with one of her four children in the rustic house that she purchased 30 years ago.  She has been a farmer since childhood.  Now that her children are grown, they come and help her every year with planting and harvesting.  As a result, her financial situation has improved, and she will be able to continue her work.  The work is difficult and very often requires the use of machines to optimize her results.

She sells her crops at wholesale in the central market of the city which is the closest to where she lives.  In the last few years she has recouped her investment.  Going forward, she wishes to enter into formal commerce.

This is her first loan through Kiva, and she is grateful for the support so that she can move forward with her plans.  She will use the loan funds to purchase organic fertilizer for her crops.  She promises to be punctual with her loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Raeda

texts.en: Raeda is a 34 year old conservative woman. She asked her husband to take her place in the photo. They have two adorable boys. Raeda’s husband Khaled has a dry cleaning shop where he does all the work by himself, from washing the clothes to ironing them. Now that the number of clients has increased, they want to bring more clothing hangers and expand the storage area where her husband keeps the clothes until their owners pick them up, which is why Raeda has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to expand the storage area where her husband keeps the clothes until their owners pick them up.

loans.name: Faatalatala

texts.en: Faatalatala is 34 years old and married with 4 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes and coconuts in her community and has been doing this for 2 years. Faatalatala has requested a loan to buy sacks of flour, dripping oil, sugar, baking powder, cement, iron roofing and bricks for her business and home improvement. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Faatalatala will improve her business to earn a good income.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, dripping oil, sugar, baking powder, cement, iron roofing and bricks

loans.name: Diana

texts.en:
Diana is 23 years old and married. While her husband is serving in the military, she opened a small home business selling blankets and bed sheets.

Diana is requesting a youth loan, which she will use to increase the quantity of goods by adding new bed cover sets and more summer blankets.

loans.use: to purchase bed cover sets and summer blankets

loans.name: Duaa

texts.en: Duaa is a single lady living with her parents and six siblings. She is 27 years old, working by selling makeup products at home to friends and neighbors. Now Duaa is applying for a youth loan to increase the quantity she has of makeup products and add more brands of cosmetics.

loans.use: to increase the quantity she has of makeup products and add more brands of cosmetics.

loans.name: Saodatkhon

texts.ru: Саодатхон жительница района Кубадиён. Ей 24 года. Она замужем и имеет двоих дочерей. Саодатхон заботливая мать и трудолюбивый человек. Она занимается земледелием. Сейчас Саодатхон имеет намерение начать новый бизнес и улучшить уровень семейного дохода, чтобы ее дети ни в чем не нуждались. Она собирается заняться торговлей детской одежды и на рынке района уже приобрела торговую точку размером 3х5 метра. У Саодатхон имеется сбережение, накопленные от продажи урожая и зарплаты мужа, остальную часть денежной суммы она запрашивает в заем. Саодатхон берет кредит для закупа сезонной детской одежды. Она планирует приобрести товар с оптового рынка  города Душанбе и продавать его по розничной цене в своем районе. Саодатхон верит, что ее бизнес будет успешным.
texts.en: Saodatkhon is a resident of Qubadiyon, Tajikistan.  She is 24 years old, married and has two daughters.  Saodatkhon is a caring mother and a hardworking person.  She works in agriculture.  Now, she wants to start her own business to increase her family's income so that her children won't want for anything.  She is planning to sell children's clothing and has already obtained space (3x5 meters) from which to do so at a local market.  Saodatkhon has savings from the sale of her crops and her husband's income.  For the rest of the money needed, she is asking for a loan.  She is taking out a loan to buy seasonal children's clothing.  She plans to buy the goods wholesale from a market in Dushanbe and sell them at retail in her own region.  Saodatkhon believes that her business will be successful.

loans.use: to buy seasonal children's clothing to sell

loans.name: Dina Abigail

texts.es:
Dina tiene 27 años de edad, es soltera. Tiene ocho años de dedicarse al comercio de ropa para caballeros, damas y niños de todas las edades; el negocio lo inicio por iniciativa propia, también ha instalado una venta de pupusas en su casa. Antes solo se dedicaba a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar maíz, chicharrón, quesillo, gas, entre otros insumos para elaborar pupusas y la otra parte para comprar ropa la que comercializara en el pueblo en donde vive. Ella no ha podido invertir en e negocio ya que lo poco que posee lo ha utilizado para cubrir los gastos del hogar. Hasta el momento la venta de ropa lo hace de manera ambulante; por lo que su sueño es poseer un local propio para vender allí.
texts.en:
Dina is 27 years old and single.  She has been making a living selling clothing for men, ladies and children of all ages for 8 years.  She started the business of her own initiative, and she has also established a pupusa [stuffed Salvadoran tortilla] stand at her house.  Before, she used to spend her time on household chores at home.

The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy corn, pork rind, local cheese, fuel, and other ingredients for making pupusas.  She will use another portion of the loan to buy clothes that she will sell in the town where she lives.

She has not been able to invest in her business, because the little she has, she has used to cover household expenses.  Until now, she has sold clothing as a street vendor; her dream is to have her own store from which to sell.

loans.use: to buy corn, pork rind, local cheese, fuel, and other ingredients for making pupusas, and with another portion, to buy clothes that she will sell in the town where she lives.

loans.name: April

texts.en: April is a new member of PMPC. She is 31 years old, married with 2 children. She is from Comunal, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte and makes income with her sari-sari. Each month, she earns 5000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 5000 to buy additional inventory to sell. In the future, April hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell/retail

loans.name: Terlan

texts.en:
Terlan is 27 years old, married, and has one child. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. Terlan is a Fuzulu refugee. He raises cattle, fattens them, and sells them for a profit, which he has been doing for five years. He is very kind, caring, and energetic in his work. This is a very profitable business and he is doing it together with his wife.

Terlan sells meat at the central bazaar. In Azerbaijan, there is a high demand for meat because it is used in a lot of meals, such as kufta (soup), kababs, dolma, etc. His income from this business is 195 AZN a month. In order to fully support the family,  Terlan  is looking to expand the business and make it very successful. With a good loan history, he is requesting his third loan for 2,000 AZN, which he will use to buy small calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Jay-Ann

texts.en:
Jay-Ann is 26 years old and married with three children. She and her family live in Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.

For the past two years Jay-Ann has owned a junk shop where she buys and sells junk to make a living. She earns about 15,000 PHP a month.

Jay-Ann is applying for a 5000 PHP loan to buy more junk to sell. She hopes to maintain a good repayment record with PMPC so that she can always go to it for any capital needs.

loans.use: to buy more junk to sell.

location.town: Liloy - Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga Del Norte

loans.name: Гулбахор

texts.ru:
Гулбахор умелая швея. Она шьёт прекрасные национальные платья для женщин. Также Гулбахор умело вышивает на платье бисера, бусы, создаёт декоративные цветы из них и украшает ими платье. Гулбахор швея с детство. У неё талант к этому мастерству. в юношеском возрасте ходила на ученики к швейному мастеру. Там же она научилась всем тонкостям своего дела. Как подчеркнула сама Гулбахор, её наставница была очень требовательной и сумела передать своё мастерство и воспитать в Гулбахоре хорошую швею. Также у неё особый талант к бисероплетению. Несмотря на свои молодые годы, она имеет определенное количество клиентов, которых Гулбахор всегда рада обслужить. Когда Гулбахор создала семью и родила двоих детей появилась необходимость в расширении место деятельности. В основном она шила дома. Но теперь с помощью ООО МДО «Арванд»  хочет создать свой маленький бизнес в не дома. В этом деле её поддерживает муж. В связи с   увеличения потребности семьи в дополнительных средствах Гулбахор хочет оборудовать место деятельности необходимыми швейными машинками. Этим она и её «маленький бизнес» смогут «выжить» и она продолжит обслуживать еще большее количество клиентов зарабатывая нужную сумму на образование детей и благополучие своей семьи.  На полученный кредит Гулбахор планирует купить швейные машинки.
 Она очень надеется, что приобретённый кредит поможет ей не остаться на полпути и перешагнуть этот трудный момент. Заранее благодарит   МДО «Арванд» за содействие и поддержку.
texts.en: Gulbakhor is a skilled seamstress.  She sews beautiful national dresses for women.  She also is able to embroider dresses with beads and make decorative flowers to decorate her dresses.  Gulbakhor has been sewing since she was a child and her talent is approaching that of a master.  When she was young, she took lessons from a master seamstress.  There, she learned all the details of the trade.  As stressed by Gulbakhor, her mentor was very demanding and managed to turn her into a talented seamstress.  She also has a special talent for beading.  Despite her young age, she has a number of dedicated clients whom she is always happy to serve.  When Gulbakhor started her own family and had two children, the need to expand her business arouse.  Mostly, she sews out of her home.  Now, with the help of Arvand, she wants to create her own small business outside of the home.  Her husband supports this effort.  Because of the increasing need of the family, she wants to equip her place of business with all necessary sewing machines.  This way, her business cab stay afloat and she can continue to serve more and more clients.  Consequently, she'll be able to earn enough money for her children's education, and to support the family.  With the loan, Gulbakhor plans to buy sewing machines.  She hopes this loan will help her move towards her ultimate goals.  She is grateful to Arvand for the assistance and support.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines

loans.name: Emprendiendo Hacia El Éxito Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 11  socios responsables a distintas actividades comerciales  todos ellos residen en el distrito de ate Vitarte. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “EMPRENDIENDO HACIA EL EXITO” una de ellas es la Sra. Elida de 27 años de edad soltera y con 3  hijos, la Sra. Elida   se dedica ya hace 1  años a la venta de jugueria En un pequeño mercado todos los días con el merito de salir adelante y así poder pagar el colegio de sus hijos y pagar los gastos de su casa, su mayor deseo es que sus hijos sean profesionales es por eso  que la Sra. Elida   trabaja mucho, Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más (frutas, cubiertos, platos, vasos)  y así poder tener más ingresos. La Sra. Elida está parada es la segunda de la mano izquierda, y sobre el brazo tiene a su bebé cogiendo una botella de plástico  un  A la vez se despide con un abraso a Kiva y  diciéndoles que cumplirá todas su metas propuestas.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Emprendiedno Hacia el Exito" is made up of eleven responsible members who are involved in various businesses.  They all live in the district of Vitarte.

One of the members is Elida, who is a 27-year-old single mother of three children. For the past year she has had a business selling juice in a small market.  She works every day with the aim of getting ahead and being able to pay tuition for her children and cover the household expenses.  Her greatest dream is for her children to become professionals; it is for this reason that she works hard.

She will invest the loan proceeds in supplies for her juice business, such as fruit, plates, utensils and glasses, which will lead to increased income.  

In the photo she is standing second from the left, and she is holding her baby, who has a plastic bottle.  She wishes to thank Kiva and says that she will make her all of her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy more supplies for her juice business.

loans.name: Riman

texts.en:
Riman is a 39-year-old, working mother. She has children to support with the help of her husband who works as a driver. 

Riman makes decoration pieces using Flynn. Most of her work is used in kindergarten and for children's parties. 

Now, she is applying for a loan to buy more of the Flynn material with bright colors, along with glitter, and other artistic accessories to make more decoration pieces.

loans.use: to buy Flynn material with bright colors, along with glitter and other artistic accessories to make decoration pieces.

loans.name: Adalah

texts.en: Adalah is a 31 years old mother to a baby daughter, and her husband is an accountant. Adalah works selling cosmetics at home, and she also takes advantage of being at home to open her house for working moms’ kids as a day care. She is now looking after 5 kids. Adalah is applying for a loan to buy more cosmetic products and enhance the day care by adding more safe toys and new mats and cushions.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetic products and enhance her day care by adding more safe toys and new mats and cushions.

loans.name: Shareefan

texts.en: Shareefan, age 46, adores her family, and her husband works very hard so that his family can have a good and respectable life. Her husband offers sheltering services. Shareefan is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of improving her husband's business. He will use the loan amount to purchase bamboo, nails, and iron sheets for his business. With the profits expected from this loan, he intends to expand his business so that he can eventually construct a small house for his family. Shareefan hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's business. She is thankful to Kiva lenders and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase bamboo, nails, and iron sheets for her husband's business

loans.name: Angelito

texts.en:
Angelito is a farmer in a rural community. He is fifty years old and has three school-aged children. As a responsible father he aims to be successful and financially stable in order to give his family better living conditions.

Farming is Angelito’s main source of income. This is why he is applying for a 30,000 PHP loan through ASKI to buy fertilizer and insecticides to improve his crop production.

Through his patience and strong determination, Angelito believes that he can improve his farm and have a plentiful harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticides

loans.name: Pape Arona

texts.fr: Monsieur PAPE ARONA est un jeune du village qui s'active dans le domaine de l'aviculture depuis 2 ans. Il est marié et père de 2 enfants, une fille et un garçon, il participe aux dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille. Il commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Pape Arona sollicite de prêt d'un montant de 150 000 F pour acheter des tablettes enfin de pouvoir y disposer les oeufs qu'il récupère dans son poulailler. A l'avenir il souhaite augmenter ses revenus et ouvrir un dépot d'aliment pour volaille.
texts.en: Mr. PAPE ARONA is a young man in the village who has been active in the domain of poultry farming for two years. He is a married father of two children, a girl and a boy. He helps to cover the day-to-day expenses of his family. His days starts at 8 AM and finishes at 7 PM. Pape Arona is requesting a loan in the amount of 150,000 francs to purchase trays for holding the eggs he gets from his chicken coop. For the future, he would like to increase his income and open a poultry feed warehouse.

loans.use: to purchase trays for holding eggs to sell from his chicken coop.

loans.name: Marilin

texts.es: La señora Marilin tiene 36 años tiene dos hijos de las edades de 9 y 11 años, que se encuentran estudiando,  ella se dedica  a la venta de comida ella vende diferentes y deliciosos platillos,  tiene su puesto de venta   que se encuentra en la localidad de Pedro Lorenzo,  La señora Marilin es una persona muy trabajadora  que con dedicación poco a poco va adquiriendo estabilidad y solvencia y también popularidad por que es muy conocida por sus clientes ya que La señora Marilin les atiende muy amablemente,  con el dinero del crédito comprara mesas y sillas para brindar comodidad a su clientes, la cliente cuenta que con mucho esfuerzo se puede crecer más y así seguir haciéndose de patrimonio para el bienestar de su familia y también personal se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Marilin is thirty-six years old and has two children aged nine and eleven who are currently in school.  She has a food stall and sells various delicious dishes.  Her stall is located in Pedro Lorenzo.  She is a very hardworking person, and through her dedication she has built up financial stability little-by-little. She is also popular with her customers due to her friendly customer service.

She will use the loan proceeds to purchase tables and chairs to provide greater comfort for her customers.  With a great deal of effort she has grown her customer base.  Through her work she is building up her assets for the well-being of her family.  She is grateful to the lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy chairs and tables.

loans.name: Leocadia

texts.es: Leocadia, de 63 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive junto a su esposo Félix con quien tiene 5 hijos, de los cuales solo vive con una de ellas: Yesenia a quién cuidan en la casa que compró hace 35 años. Todos los días trabajan sin descanso para el progreso de su familia, pues desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Su actividad económica se centra en la agricultura y el trabajo de albañil de su esposo, de donde obtiene el dinero para solventar los gastos y ambiciones del hogar. Pero la actividad en la que más se divierte es el tejido de frazadas y colchas, las que realiza de manera manual, comenta que gracias a su buen gusto y el arte que heredó de sus padres tiene muchos pedidos, posee clientes puntuales que le dan un adelanto económico para poder confeccionar sus manteles los cuales son usados con fines decorativos y muchas veces para abrigarse del frío, pues están confeccionadas a base de lana de alpaca. Ahora desea mejorar sus creaciones para poder vender más.Este es el segundo crédito con KIVA y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero brindado ya que le permite seguir adelante.Leocadia, invertirá los S/.1000 soles en la compra de lana de alpaca por cantidad para continuar con sus tejidos, pues tiene muchos pedidos.
texts.en:
Leocadia, 63 years old, is a hardworking woman. She lives with her husband Felix, which whom she has five children, of whom she only lives with her daughter, Yessenia, whom they have cared for in the house that they bought 35 years ago. They work every day, without fail, for the good of their family. She wants to give them a better quality of life.

Her work centers on farming and the bricklaying work her husband does, which is where they get the money to pay for household expenses and needs. But the work that she enjoys the most is crocheting blankets and bedspreads by hand. She says that thanks to her good taste and the art that she inherited from her parents, she has many orders. She has punctual customers who pay in advance so she is able to make her blankets that are used for decoration as well as for protection from the cold. This is why they are made from alpaca wool.

Now she wants to improve her creations to be able to sell more. This is the second loan with Kiva, and she is grateful for the financial support provided that allows her to succeed. Leocadia will invest the S/.1000 soles in the purchase of alpaca wool wholesale to continue her crocheting because she has many orders.

loans.use: purchase alpaca wool.

loans.name: Artemia

texts.en:
Artemia is 48 years old and lives in Silucap, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 6 children.
Artemia owns a shoe repair shop and operates it with her husband as her business partner, and earns approximately 10000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for additional capital for the said shoe repair shop.
Artemia has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Artemia hopes to expand her shop.

loans.use: buy materials for her shoe repair shop

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr: Moussa est un jeune agriculteur  qui a une expérience de plus de 10 ans dans ce domaine. Il est marié et père de famille. Il habite à environ 22 km de la ville principale. Il y possède un champ ou il fait du maraichage. Il sollicite son 3ème crédit  dans l’institution et cela pour acheter des semences de choux et des intrants agricoles (gasoil, engrais) .Moussa démarre  sa journée à 8 h pour la terminer à 18h. Il gère la dépense quotidienne de la famille. Et avec les revenus de son activité il peut  améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille et réussi même à épargner. Car il voudrait ouvrir une boutique de produits agricoles dans l’avenir
texts.en: Moussa is a young farmer who has over ten years of experience in this domain. He is a married father and lives about 22 km from the main city. He has a field there, where he carries out market gardening. He is requesting his third loan at this institution for purchasing cabbage seeds and farm inputs (diesel fuel, fertilizer). Moussa starts his day at 8 AM and finishes at 7 PM. He is managing the day-to-day expenses of his family. With the revenues from his business, he can improve his family's food situation and even save some money, since he wants to open a store for farm products in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Al-Wafa Group

texts.en:
Al-Wafa Group consists of four women from Aden, Yemen. They are applying for a 230,000 YER loan through Al-Amal to buy women's clothes to sell. The loan will be split among them.

Klthom, fifty, is a member of this group. She knows how to read and write. Her husband works very hard and does his best to provide his family with food and clothing, but unfortunately the money he makes is really not enough to support the family adequately.

Ten years ago, Klthom decided to help her husband with the family’s finances. In the beginning she started going door to door selling products that only earned her a small income. Then she started selling clothes.

Now that Klthom has enough experience selling clothes, she intends to have her own independent business selling them. For this reason she will receive a 70,000 YER portion of the loan. She hopes that she will make a profit selling a lot of clothes to new clients in different quarters and places in her city.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds and farm inputs for market gardening.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: La Sra. Bertha tiene 62 años, tiene 6 hijos ya mayores de edad e independientes,   ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, su panadería  que se encuentra ubicado  en la zona de ciudad Satelite,  es cliente antigua de la institución, saco los anteriores créditos siempre para mejorar su negocio, La Sra. Bertha va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material de construcción como tejas para la construcción de un galpón  para el lugar donde se encuentra su horno y donde será su panadería, La Sra. Bertha es una persona  con ganas de superación se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse.
texts.en: Bertha is 62 years old and has six children who are all adults and live independently.  Her business is making and selling bread.  Her bakery is located in the Satelite district of the city.  Bertha is an existing member of the institution and all of her previous loans have been taken out to improve her business.  She will use this loan to buy construction supplies such as tiles to build a storehouse where her oven and bakery are.  Bertha is a person with a desire to improve herself.  She feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support they have provided as this is the only business activity she has with which to support herself.

loans.use: to finish building a storehouse at home for her bakery

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo, ya que los créditos son una fuente para incrementar los ingresos; este le permitirá comprar seis quintales de abono, insecticidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas para suministrar una manzana de maíz.
La inversión del crédito anterior le ayudo a incrementar  la cosecha y los ingresos; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares se han optimizado.
texts.en:
José has decided that he needs to apply for a new loan, since the loans are a way for him to increase his income. This will allow him to buy six quintals of fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides, and treatments for plant diseases, in order to maintain a field of corn. 

The investment of the previous loan helped him to increase his harvest and his income. His economic condition and his family's circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy six quintals of fertilizer, insecticides, pesticides and treatments for plant diseases.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  Benkadi est constitué de 4 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 29 ans et 1 enfant. Elles vivent  à moitié dans des  familles nucléaires  à Dialanikoro, un des quartiers de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Afin de  renforcer leurs capacités financières pour de mieux faire leurs commerces, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur deuxième  prêt et le prêt précédent a  été correctement remboursé. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de de condiments,  de chaussures, de farine de blé, d’habits, etc.
HABY, première de la droite vers la gauche,  fait l’achat vente de farine de blé.  Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 5 sacs de farine de blé auprès des grossistes. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché, dans les foires des villages environnants  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The group Benkadi is composed of four women who are all married. They average 29 years of age and one child each, and half of them live in nuclear families in Dialanikoro, a district in Bougouni City. They know one another through ties of community, friendship, and commerce.
